akas: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (original title)
akas from release info: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (original title)

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

1.plot: Aarti Dubey and family attends a friend's wedding celebration where she was humiliated due to mistaken introduction.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

2.plot: Yash is a wedding planner and was there organizing Mansi's wedding. According to the setup, once the bride and groom exchanged garlands, flowers were to fall on them but the machine/mechanism/container thing was jammed so he climbed up to fix it, only for the flowers to fall on Aarti. Meanwhile, his family is introduced. His mother and Vidhi bhabhi both want him to be re-married but know it's hard to convince Yash, who is in love with his previous wife Arpita. Yash's brother Prateik also wants Yash to be happy and has vowed not to marry until Yash does.

3.title: Shobha tries to convince Aartiji to agree for a remarriage

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

3.plot: On the way back from Mansi's marriage, Aarti has flashbacks of her past with her ex-husband Prashant. She remembers how they were in love and the day that Prashant proposed to her and asked her to spend eternity with him. Then she remembers the day he left her, when she was pregnant with Ansh, for another woman. Shobha becomes more determined than ever to get Aarti married and so they go to meet a potential groom, Raghudayal at the mall. He is sleazy and much older than Aarti and tries to take advantage of her, claiming he is doing her a favor by even considering ...

4.title: Untowards meeting of babhi and devar -to-be..

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

4.plot: Next morning, Pratik visits Aarti's house. Satyendra Dubey is none other than Aarti's father-in-law. Aarti is puzzled on seeing Pratik and enquires. She gets furious on learning that Pratik had come to take back the advance payment which they had made for the lights they had purchased. Aarti refuses to return the money, instead asks Pratik to pay full payment of the commodities that Pankaj had purchased from them. When she asks Pratik to leave, he refuses and states that he would not leave until Satyendra returns the money. Aarti gets furious and threatens to hit ...

5.title: Unexpected Meeting at the Holy Pilgrimage

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

5.plot: The Scindias and the Dubeys coincidentally decide to visit the same dargah and are on the same train there. Yash and Aarti have a run-in outside the bathroom but do not see each others' faces. Aarti lands up in the A/C compartment when Ansh runs in and the conductor is about to penalise her when Prateek saves her by saying she is his sister in law. This gives Prateek the idea that Yash and Aarti might be perfect for each other and he conveys it to his mother (Gayatri) and Vidhi who are impressed with Aarti. They approach Shobha and Dubey with the alliance and Gayatri ...

6.title: Both Families Mull Over the Idea of Remarriage

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

6.plot: Back in Bhopal, Satyendar Dubey has decided to take the proposal without informing the Sindhias about Aarti's divorce, convincing Aarti into agreeing for a remarriage reminding her how hard is for Ansh longing for a father who is uncertain to come back. SP convinces Yash that he must get married because his brother's wedding is stalled thanks to him and it is not good for a man to grieve over his wife the way Yash grieves Arpita. Yash is not happy with the decision but accepts and everyone is happy.

7.title: Stubborn Hearts, Duty Binds..

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

7.plot: A furious Aarti rejects Yash's proposal as she does not want to separate from Ansh. She questions Shobha on how she could even think of accepting Scindia family's demand regarding Ansh. Shobha is prompted to call Gayatri to reject the proposal. Yash overhears the call and says that a woman who can separate from her own biological child will never be able to take care of her step-daughters. Papa Sindhia makes a wise-decision by agreeing with Yash and so they accept Ansh.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

8.plot: Ansh's school organizes a sports day for parents. Aarti decides to participate in the three-legged race along with Ansh. Aarti has to compete with the fathers of other children. Aarti and Aansh loses in the game when her dupatta fell. Ansh is saddened by their lose while Aarti and Mansi tries ti cheer him up. Meanwhile Pratik starts calling people to organize the double-wedding. Yash and Aarti spends a quiet evening on opposite sides of a temple pool wondering about the future and their children.

9.title: Fear and Anticipation of the Unknown..

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

9.plot: Mansi joins Aarti and convinces her to accept the proposal for the sake of Ansh and getting over Prashant who isn't coming back. On the other hand, Yash is also worried about his daughter. Just when Aarti finally decides to agree, Prashant calls in the night and ask to speak to his dad, Sobha shuts him down and says all ties with him was cut off the day he decided to walk out on a pregnant Aarti. In the solitude of their room, Aarti cries for missing and still loving Prashant all this time. Shobha comes and tries firmly to console her to completely forget him.

10.title: AnshPayPal, for the Children's Sakes..

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

10.plot:

11.title: No Turning Back to Start a New Beginning..

episode of.title: Punar Vivaah: Zindagi Milegi Dobara (TV Series 2012–2013)

11.plot: Aarti meets Mansi and informs her that she has accepted Yash's marriage proposal. She is scared about her future with Yash as she believes that two individuals cannot live together if they do not love each other. Instead of pacifying Aarti, Mansi tells her that a relationship can only work if they was physical intimacy between the partners. Aarti disagrees with Mansi. When Aarti arrives home, Shobha and Satyendra inform her that the Scindia family would be coming the following day for roka and engagement ceremony. The duo also shows Aarti the ring which they purchased...

imdb.plot outline: The show is based on the concept of remarriage where in kids from previous marriages are involved . It describes the story of a couple who are pressured to live together under critical circumstances and how their emotions and feelings bring them together. Follows the lives of Yash, a widower who has two daughters and Aarti, a divorcee, who put their children's need first while unwittingly discovering each other, heart and soul.
